description: Choose your character's gender
Choose your character's name
Set the clock in your room
Withdraw Potion from PC in your room
Visit your neighbor's house
Meet your rival (May/Brendan) upstairs
Help Professor Birch escape from a wild Pokémon
Choose your starter Pokémon (Treecko, Torchic, Mudkip)
Defeat wild Zigzagoon to save Professor Birch
Head North of town to Oldale Town
Visit the Pokémon Center in Oldale Town
Receive a free Potion from the woman outside the Poké Mart
Defeat your rival on Route 103
Return to Professor Birch's lab to receive the Pokédex
Receive 5 Pokéballs from your rival
Receive Running Shoes from your Mom
Battle the first trainer on Route 102
Battle the second trainer on Route 102 (2 Wurmple)
Battle the third trainer on Route 102 (Zigzagoon and Taillow)
Battle the fourth trainer on Route 102 (Zigzagoon and Shroomish)
Catch a Lotad for the next gym
Catch a Ralts on Route 102
Visit Petalburg Gym and talk to your Dad
Help Wally catch a Pokémon
Head West of Petalburg to Petalburg Woods
Encounter a random man as you leave Petalburg
Battle the fisherman south of the Cottage on Route 104
Battle the trainer with Zigzagoon south of the Cottage
Battle the last trainer before Petalburg Woods (Zigzagoon)
Enter Petalburg Woods
Battle the Bug Trainer with Wurmple in Petalburg Woods
Help the man being attacked by an Aqua Grunt
Defeat the Aqua Grunt (Poochyena)
Receive a Great Ball from the man you helped
Battle the trainer with Nincada after the Aqua Grunt
Exit Petalburg Woods and head to Route 104
Visit the flower shop to receive a Wailmer Pail
Receive a berry from the woman in the flower shop
Battle the rich trainer with Zigzagoon right of the flower shop
Battle the lady with Lotad and Shroomish
Cross the bridge and enter your first double battle (Seedot and Lotad)
Battle the fisherman with Magikarp past the bridge
Visit Cutter's House to receive HM01 Cut
Enter the Rustboro City Gym
Defeat the first Gym Trainer with Geodude
Defeat the double battle with two Geodude
Battle Gym Leader Roxanne
Defeat Roxanne's Geodude
Defeat Roxanne's Nosepass
Earn the Stone Badge
Gain the ability to use Cut outside of battle
Encounter the robbed man after leaving the Gym
Heal your Pokémon at the Pokémon Center
Find the robbed man north of Rustboro City
Agree to help retrieve the stolen Goods
Battle the bottom path trainer on Route 106 (Wurmple and Nincada)
Battle the top path trainer on Route 106 (Machop)
Battle the schoolgirl with Shroomish
Complete the double battle with Shroomish, Geodude, and Lotad
Battle the Hiker with Geodudes
Meet the two people who encountered Team Aqua
Enter Rusturf Tunnel
Battle the Aqua Grunt in Rusturf Tunnel (Poochyena)
Retrieve the Devon Goods and Peeko from the Aqua Grunt
Meet Capt. Briney and earn a favor
Return the Devon Goods to the man in Rustboro City
Receive a Great Ball from the Devon employee
Meet the President of Devon Corp and receive the PokéNav
Receive a mission to deliver a letter to Dewford and Goods to Slateport
Meet the fossil reviver on the second floor of Devon Corp
Upgrade the PokéNav with the phone feature
Catch a Pokémon that can learn Cut (Nincada if needed)
Head back to Rusturf Tunnel to battle trainers to the left of the Rest Stop
Battle the trainer with Lotad, 2 Zigzagoon, and Poochyena
Complete the second double battle with Marill and Ralts
Evolve Lotad into Lombre (if applicable)
Use Cut on normal grass to clear it temporarily
Challenge your rival outside Rustboro City (optional)
Use Cut in Petalburg Woods to obtain Miracle Seed
Capture or ensure you have a Flying-type Pokémon (e.g., Taillow)
Talk to Capt. Briney to sail to Dewford
Obtain the Old Rod from the fisherman by the Dewford Gym
Enter Dewford Gym and begin clearing it
Battle the first Gym trainer with Meditite
Complete the double battle with Meditite and Machop
Battle the trainer with Makuhita on the left path
Battle the trainer with Machop on the right path
Battle the final Gym trainer with Meditite
Challenge Gym Leader Brawly
Defeat Brawly's Machop, Meditite, and Makuhita
Earn the Knuckle Badge
Re-enter Granite Cave with a Pokémon that knows Flash
Deliver the letter to Steven in Granite Cave
Receive TM from Steven
Return to the Devon Corp President to receive Exp. Share
Talk to Capt. Briney to sail to Slateport City
Battle the trainers on the Slateport beaches
Receive a hold item from the kids on the beach
Complete the double battle with Marill and Wingull
Battle the double battle with Tentacool and Azurill near the red umbrellas
Visit the Seaside Shack and challenge the three trainers
Defeat the girl with Goldeen in the Seaside Shack
Defeat the tuber with Azurill and Marill in the Seaside Shack
Defeat the sailor with Wingull, Tentacool, and Machop in the Seaside Shack
Receive free Soda Pop after defeating all trainers in the Seaside Shack
Stock up on Soda Pop from the Seaside Shack
Visit the Slateport Shipyard and learn Stern is at the museum
Enter the museum and pay the entry fee
Receive a TM from the Aqua Grunt you defeated earlier
Meet Capt. Stern on the second floor of the museum
Defeat the Team Aqua Grunts in the museum
Encounter Team Aqua Leader Archie and stop the theft of Devon Goods
Leave the museum and meet Scott outside
Purchase a Harbor Mail from the Slateport Poké Mart
Head north of Slateport City to reach Route 110
Receive Prof. Birch's number on Route 110
Complete the double battle with Plusle and Minun on Route 110
Enter the Trick House and solve the first puzzle using Cut
Battle the trainer with Oddish in the Trick House
Battle the trainer with Skitty, Shroomish, and Marill in the Trick House
Battle the trainer with Zigzagoon in the Trick House
Receive a Rare Candy from the Trick Master
Battle the trainer with Shroomish and Roselia left of the Trick House
Complete the double battle with Plusle and Minun past the Trick House
Battle the trainer with Skitty past the twins on Route 110
Battle the angry fisherman with Magikarp and Tentacool
Complete the double battle with Makuhita and Voltorb behind the twins
Battle the trainer with Aron and Electrike before Mauville
Battle your rival on Route 110
Receive a present from your rival after the battle
Complete the double battle with Electrike, Voltorb, Lombre, and Nuzleaf
Complete the double battle with Magnemite and Abra
Battle the last fisherman on Route 110 with Tentacool and Wailmer
Trade Harbor Mail for a Coin Case in Mauville
Receive HM Rock Smash from the man in the house right of the Poké Mart
Visit the Bicycle Shop and choose a Mach or Acro Bike
Battle Wally in front of the Mauville Gym
Enter Mauville Gym and start clearing it
Complete the double battle with Electrike, Meditite, and Voltorb in the Gym
Battle the trainer in the middle of the Gym with Zigzagoon and Gulpin
Complete the double battle with Illumise, Volbeat, Voltorb, and Magnemite in the Gym
Solve the electrified grid puzzle in Mauville Gym
Challenge Gym Leader Wattson
Defeat Wattson's Voltorb, Electrike, Magneton, and Manectric
Earn the Dynamo Badge
Gain the ability to use Rock Smash outside of battle
Visit the Day Care Center on Route 117
Battle the twins with Makuhita and Zigzagoon near the Day Care
Battle the trainer with Whismur, Aron, Taillow, Poochyena, Makuhita, and Zigzagoon
Battle the trainers below the Day Care (Pokémon around level 18)
Battle the trainer with Beautifly and Dustox past the pond
Battle the trainers with Doduo and Ralts above the pond
Battle the trainer with Meditite above the pond
Battle the trainer with 6 weak Pokémon before entering Rusturf Tunnel
Defeat the trainer with Wingull, Marill, Goldeen, Shroomish, Roselia, and Skitty
Head to Rusturf Tunnel from Rustboro City
Use Rock Smash to enter Rusturf Tunnel
Explore the left path outside Rusturf Tunnel
Find the lost glasses using the Itemfinder or by pressing A
Battle the Hiker in Rusturf Tunnel with Geodude and Machop
Use Rock Smash to reunite Wanda and the tunnel digger
Receive HM Strength from the tunnel digger
Head north of Mauville to Route 111
Battle the trainers with Roselia and Sandshrew on Route 111
Complete the double battle with Numel and Shroomish on Route 111
Visit the building to the right for healing and post-game battles
Challenge the Winstrate family (4 battles in a row)
Defeat the Winstrate father with Taillow and Zigzagoon
Defeat the Winstrate mother with Marill, Shroomish, and Numel
Defeat the Winstrate daughter with Numel
Defeat the Winstrate grandmother with Meditite
Receive the Macho Brace from the Winstrate mother
Use Rock Smash to break the rocks north of the Winstrate house
Battle the reporters with Whismur and Magnemite
Battle the camper with Shroomish and Marill
Battle the camper with Sandshrew
Encounter the desert and learn you can't proceed yet
Head left of the desert to find Fire-type Pokémon
Battle the camper below the grass area with Nuzleaf
Battle the camper with Taillow and Lombre
Arrive at the base of Mt. Chimney
Battle the hiker on the right with Numel and Machop
Discover Team Magma blocking the cable car entrance
Head left to battle the hiker with Geodude
Enter Fiery Path and explore for more Fire-type Pokémon
Complete the double battle at the start of Route 112
Battle the trainer with Shroomish and Roselia
Battle the trainer with Numel
Battle the Cooltrainer with Electrike, Makuhita, and Wailmer
Receive TM Secret Power from the man by the tree
Visit the Rest Stop to heal your Pokémon
Battle the trainer with Wingull, Numel, and Roselia
Enter Route 113 with soot-covered grass
Battle the trainer with Trapinch on Route 113
Complete the double battle with Koffing, Baltoy, and Sandshrew
Battle the trainer with Aron after the double battle
Collect the Nugget of gold hidden behind the third trainer
Battle the trainer with Numel on Route 113
Complete the double battle with twins using Spinda
Visit the Glass Workshop and receive the Soot Sack
Battle the hidden ninja with Koffing near the Glass Workshop
Battle the trainer with Aron near the end of Route 113
Complete the double battle with Skarmory, Marill, Swellow, and Lombre
Meet Lanette at the Fallabor Town Pokémon Center and later at her house
Learn about Team Magma's activity in Meteor Falls
Visit the move relearner and learn about Heart Scales
Receive TM Dig from the Fossil Maniac's brother
Battle the Fisherman with Barboach
Complete the double battle with Nuzleaf and Barboach near the bridge
Cross the bridge and battle the Fisherman with Magikarp, Barboach, and Goldeen
Battle the Camper with Marill and Lombre
Find the berries around the house after crossing the bridge
Battle the twins with Graveler and Roselia south of Lanette's house
Battle the Camper with Sandshrew and Nuzleaf
Battle the Trainer with Aron
Enter Meteor Falls and witness the event with Team Magma and Team Aqua
Exit Meteor Falls to Route 115 and battle the Martial Artist with Machop
Battle the Martial Artist with Meditite and Makuhita near the beach
Complete the double battle with Meditite, Zangoose, Seviper, and Spoink
Collect the PP Up shortly past the double battle
Return to Fallabor Town and go to the cable cars on Mt. Chimney
Witness the battle between Team Aqua and Team Magma at Mt. Chimney
Complete the double battle with Numel and Zubat on Mt. Chimney
Battle the Magma Grunt with Numel, Zubat, and Poochyena
Defeat Maxie at Mt. Chimney
Retrieve the Meteorite from Maxie's device and return it to Prof. Cosma
Purchase cookies from the old lady near the entrance of Jagged Path
Battle the Trainer with Geodude and Baltoy on Jagged Path
Battle the Magma Grunt with Poochyena and Numel on Jagged Path
Battle the Camper with Shroomish, Oddish, and Altaria
Complete the double battle with Magnemite and Shroomish near the camper and cyclist
Battle the Trainer with Zigzagoon and Taillow at the end of Jagged Path
Arrive in Lavaridge Town and prepare to challenge the Fire-type Gym Leader Flannery
Navigate the misty Lavaridge Gym and engage the trainers hidden in the holes
Defeat the first trainer with Slugma after entering the first hole
Complete the double battle against Numel and Slugma in the second room
Win the double battle against Kecleon and Numel in the room with three holes
Defeat the trainer with Numel in the next room after the double battle
Engage and defeat the trainer with Slugma hidden in the top-right hole
Win the battle against the trainer with Meditite in the top-left hole
Reach the Gym Leader Flannery and prepare for battle
Defeat Flannery, the Fire-type Gym Leader, and earn the Heat Badge
Receive the Go-Goggles from your rival after defeating Flannery, allowing access to the desert
Return to Petalburg City to challenge your father, Norman, for the fifth Gym Badge
Navigate the Speed Room, Confusion Room, and Strength Room to reach Norman
Defeat the Gym trainers in the Defense Room, OHKO Room, and Accuracy Room
Defeat Norman, the Normal-type Gym Leader, and earn the Balance Badge
Receive HM03 Surf from Wally's dad as a reward for defeating Norman
Obtain the Amulet Coin from your mom after returning home
Use Surf on Route 103 to access new areas and trainers
Meet Wattson in Mauville City and receive the key to New Mauville
Explore New Mauville, disable the generators, and return to Wattson for your reward
Travel to Route 118, encountering trainers along the way
Defeat the trainers using Zigzagoon, Roselia, Aron, Shroomish, and Electrike on Route 118
Battle and defeat the fisherman with Tentacool on Route 118
Defeat the rocker trainer with Magnemite and Whismur on Route 118
Surf across the small river on Route 118 to reach the other side
Obtain the Good Rod from the fisherman on the other side of the river
Battle the reporters on the other side of Route 118 who now have Exploud and Magnemite
Defeat the fisherman with Tentacool and Carvanha further down Route 118
Battle the bird trainer with Taillow and Swellow
Defeat the bird trainer with Wingull on the right side of Route 118
Navigate through Route 119's tall grass areas, battling Bug Trainers along the way
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Surskit on Route 119
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Nincada and Ninjask
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Wurmple, Cascoon, and Dustox
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Ninjask
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Wurmple, Silcoon, and Beautifly
Battle and defeat the Bug Trainer with Volbeat and Illumise
Battle the Pokémon Ranger with Gloom and Roselia by the bridge
Battle the Camper with Breloom after crossing the bridge
Battle the Double Battle trainers with Swellow and Goldeen
Use the Mach Bike to reach the higher area and battle the Trainer with Wingull and Tropius
Battle the Double Battle trainers with Ninjask, Koffing, Slugma, and Numel
Enter the Weather Institute and heal at the bed
Defeat the Team Aqua Grunts inside the Weather Institute
Battle the Team Aqua Admin with Carvanha and Mightyena
Receive Castform or take the Mystic Water from it after saving the Weather Institute
Battle your Rival on the bridge, who now uses Lombre, Slugma, and their Starter Pokémon
Receive HM Fly from your Rival after the battle
Battle the Trainer with Manectric north of the bridge
Battle the hidden Ninja with Ninjask disguised as a tree
Battle the hidden Ninja with Koffing
Reach Fortree City, the location of the Sixth Gym
Obtain TM Hidden Power in Fortree City by solving the woman's riddle
Discover that you cannot reach the Fortree City Gym and must find a way to bypass the invisible barrier
Meet Steven on Route 120, who reveals the invisible Kecleon and gives you the Devon Scope
Use the Devon Scope to make the Kecleon flee and gain access to the Fortree City Gym
Enter the Fortree City Gym and begin solving the turnstile puzzles
Battle the first Gym Trainer in Fortree Gym, who uses Skarmory
Defeat the Double Battle Trainers in Fortree Gym using Doduo, Swablu, Tropius, and Skarmory
Navigate through the remaining turnstiles to face the Gym Leader
Battle and defeat Winona, the Fortree City Gym Leader
Earn the Feather Badge, allowing you to use Fly outside of battle
After obtaining the Devon Scope, cross the bridge Steven left you at on Route 120
Battle the trainer past the bridge who uses Wingull and Natu
Head south through the tall grass and cross another bridge to reach Route 121
Encounter Team Aqua on Route 121, heading towards Mt. Pyre
Ignore Team Aqua for now and continue to Lilycove City
In Lilycove City, visit the Pokémon Center and heal your Pokémon
Visit Mt. Pyre by surfing around the mountain and entering the cave
Climb Mt. Pyre and battle Team Aqua Grunts at the summit
Learn that Team Aqua has stolen the Red Orb and left for their hideout
Obtain the Pokéblock Case in Lilycove City's Contest Hall to access the Safari Zone
Battle your Rival in front of the Lilycove Department Store, now with a Tropius on their team
Visit the Move Deleter's house in Lilycove City to remove unwanted moves, including HMs
Learn from Aqua Grunts in Lilycove that Team Aqua is planning something at Slateport
Travel to Slateport City and witness Team Aqua stealing a submarine during an interview
Return to Lilycove and infiltrate Team Aqua's base to stop their plans
Navigate the teleporters in Team Aqua's hideout to find a Master Ball and battle Aqua Admin
Discover that Archie has escaped and prepare for a sea journey from Slateport
Head to Route 124 and take the straight path toward Mossdeep City
Battle the double battle trainers on Route 124
Encounter a lone swimmer on Route 124 after passing the double battle
If you hit a dead end, go a little bit south to continue
Visit the house on the ocean owned by the Hunter
Learn that the Hunter will trade evolutionary stones for certain items you can find underwater after obtaining Dive
Arrive at Mossdeep City after a short hop to the right from the Hunter's house
Arrive at Mossdeep City
Visit the Space Center on the right side of Mossdeep Island
Learn that Steven is helping out at the Space Center because of Team Magma's presence
Prepare a Dark-type Pokémon to defeat the seventh Gym
Battle against Tate and Liza, the twin Gym Leaders, in a double battle
Navigate the Gym where every battle can be a double battle
Take the teleporter in the bottom left corner of the Gym
Hit the green switch twice to pass through the teleporter room
Navigate through the blue and red switches to reach the next room
Make your way back to the first blue button and press it to reach the right side of the room
Take the teleporter to reach the Gym Leader room
Challenge Tate and Liza with Pokémon around level 38
Watch out for Earthquake and use Water and Dark-type moves to win the battle
Obtain the Mind Badge after defeating Tate and Liza
Head to the Space Center where Team Magma has arrived
Battle through Team Magma grunts and reach the second floor
Fight three trainers at once on the second floor, each with one Pokémon
Meet Steven with Maxie in the bottom left corner and prepare for a double battle
Steven joins you in a double battle against Maxie and his Admin
Win the double battle and follow Steven to his house on the top left corner of the island
Receive the HM Dive from Steven
Learn that dark patches of water can be used to dive to the ocean floor
Prepare a Pokémon that knows Dive and head to the bottom left corner of the shore
Head south through Route 124
Pass a red-headed swimmer on Route 124
Continue south until you reach Route 126
Engage in a double battle on Route 126
Keep moving until you reach the area with white rocks
Dive around the area with white rocks
Find a cave at the bottom of the underwater area
Enter the cave and resurface to reach Sootopolis City
Locate the Poké Mart on the left-hand side of Sootopolis City
Locate the Pokémon Center on the right-hand corner of Sootopolis City
Discover that the Gym in Sootopolis City is currently closed
Prepare to leave Sootopolis City and look for Team Aqua using Dive
Ensure you have a Pokémon with Rock Smash and Strength before leaving Sootopolis City
Resurface right outside the city after diving
Surf to the bottom right corner and follow the wall to navigate
Identify regular brown-colored rocks as you get closer to your destination
Navigate around the brown rocks to follow a path
Follow a path along diveable water
Encounter a red swimmer with a Wingull and a Staryu
Continue south to reach Route 128
Locate a shallow piece of water to land on
Dive into the water to discover a cave
Enter the cave to find the stolen submarine
Resurface inside the cave and land
Enter the cave to confront Team Aqua
Take the left path and encounter rocks to break and boulders to move
Solve boulder and rock puzzles to progress through the cave
Navigate currents and puzzles to reach Archie
Battle Archie and witness Kyogre awakening
Fly to Sootopolis City to stop Kyogre and Groudon
Witness the cutscene of Kyogre and Groudon fighting in Sootopolis
Follow Steven to the Cave of Origin and meet Wallace
Head to Sky Pillar to awaken Rayquaza
Return to Sootopolis to see Rayquaza stop the battle
Receive the HM Waterfall from Wallace
Solve the final Gym's floor puzzle and defeat Juan
Obtain the final badge, preparing for the Elite Four
Optional: Return to Sky Pillar to catch Rayquaza
Prepare for a battle with Rayquaza at LVL 70
Notice the increased number of rocks on the path compared to last time
Use a Mach Bike to navigate the Sky Pillar
Get a running start to reach the bottom
Prepare for a tight turn while navigating
Turn left, then up, then right, and then up again to progress
Reach the next floor and get ready for another tight turn
Navigate left and then straight up at the rock
Back up and fall through the second or third crack
Reach the top of Sky Pillar where Rayquaza is located
Save the game before battling Rayquaza to avoid missing the chance to catch it
Head to where Team Aqua awakened Kyogre, then head right with a Pokémon that knows Waterfall
Pass the fisherman and encounter a swimmer
Reach Evergrande City and scale the Waterfall to reach the Pokémon Center
Prepare Pokémon with Strength, Rock Smash, Flash, Surf, and Waterfall for Victory Road
Enter Victory Road and be ready for strong battles
Wally challenges you after crossing the bridge in Victory Road
Defeat Wally's team, which includes Altaria, Magneton, Gardevoir, Delcatty, and Roselia
Heal your Pokémon if needed and head North of Wally
Navigate the boulder and rock puzzles to progress
Use Flash to light the way after going down the ladder
Move boulders and break rocks to clear the path in Victory Road
Use Waterfall to ascend and descend different areas in Victory Road
Reach the exit of Victory Road by navigating past trainers and obstacles
Arrive at the entrance to the Pokémon League
Purchase around 50 Full Restores and 50 Revives from the Pokémon Mart at the Pokémon League
Ensure all badges are confirmed at the Pokémon League entrance
Prepare a team with Pokémon at least Level 45 with moves: Fighting, Electric, Fire, Dark, Ice, Flying
Defeat Sidney of the Elite Four using Fighting, Fire, and Electric moves
Defeat Phoebe of the Elite Four using Dark moves; avoid using Normal and Fighting moves
Defeat Glacia of the Elite Four using Electric and Fire moves
Defeat Drake of the Elite Four using Ice and Electric moves
Defeat Wallace, the Champion, using Electric and Grass moves
Record your team in the Hall of Fame after defeating the Elite Four and Champion
Complete Pokémon Emerald after recording in the Hall of Fame
